title: EasyNotes - The best way to take notes
description: EasyNotes is a personal project with which I intend to create a free and paid service according to people's needs to help them organize their lives and be more productive every day.

title: Standard calculator - web technologies
description: In this project I developed a web application in JavaScript with React and Bootstrap, to perform basic arithmetic calculations and includes a set of visual themes, to improve accessibility.
attributionImg: Photo by Towfiqu barbhuiya on Unsplash

title: Management system - AWS - RDS - REACT - Apache 2
description: In this project I developed a web system that allows to manage sandwiches, for this I used React, MySQL in RDS, Ubuntu Server among other technologies, like Apache2 and ExpressJS.

title: My personal portfolio & this blog
description: This project is a personal case for me, so I don't think it's possible to consider it finished at some point, as I have to add improvements day by day to improve the user experience.
attributionImg: Photo by Fernando Hernandez on Unsplash

title: ISP Public IP Address Tracker
description: This project is a public IP address tracker, so you can find out the IP, time zone and name of the ISP you are connected to. If you do not enter an IP address it will use your current public IP.
